title: Hunted and Harried
author: Ballantyne, R. M. (Robert Michael)
snippet: It is said that theminister of Irongray at that time was suspected of favourable leaningstoward the Covenanters, and that the proprietor of the neighbouring farmof Hallhill betrayed similar symptoms; hence the selection of theparticular spot between the two places, in order to intimidate both theminister and the farmer.
